BREAST-COMPOSITION: ACR B (Scattered areas of fibroglandular density)
FINDINGS: The mammogram shows scattered areas of fibroglandular density. A well-defined circumscribed mass is observed in the upper outer quadrant, measuring approximately 1.2 cm. No architectural distortions or asymmetries are noted. Calcifications are present but appear benign (microcalcifications). Further evaluation with ultrasound and biopsy is recommended.
